title: More College Athletes Are Trekking to Ironman
description: The extreme triathlon has long been out of reach for many young athletes because of financial hurdles and timing demands. New rules and the coronavirus pandemic changed that.
dc:creator: David W. Chen
media:credit: Mia A'i for The New York Times
media:description: Some college athletes turned to bicycling, swimming and running during the coronavirus pandemic. The Ironman allowed them to show off their improved skills.
